Dialogue: The little one on the right has a broken feather. It’s not getting any food...
Look, it's pecking bread from my hand!
The birds are always by this bench. Are they waiting for you to feed them?
I don't know. I don't think they remember this sort of things.
Birds have really good memories for faces. And your face is kind. I think they like you.
Next time I come by, could we feed them together? I'll bring seeds.
Then I'll be back tomorrow! Can't wait.
We're like, bird-friends now! See you tomorrow!
